item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1166; 04:39PM; 1722 N Stanley Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3JRqDSe; Hollywood Hills West; Firefighters found the one-story craftsman-style home fully involved with fire. A total of 32 firefighters performed a coordinated attack, between interior fire attack and rooftop ventilation, to extinguish the flames in 23 minutes. No reported injuries.; FS 41; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC5 CM52 E227 E261 E27 E41 E482 RA41 RA97 T27 T61; CH9; 14; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1166; 04:16PM; 1722 N Stanley Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3JRqDSe; Hollywood Hills West; One-story crafstman home with heavy fire showing. title.a: #HarvardFire - Knockdown - Greater Alarm Structure Fire 02/23/2022 INC#1160

item.description: #HarvardFire - Knockdown - Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#1160; 05:38PM; 315 S Harvard Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3IfW0Wf; #Koreatown; Address Numeric Corrected to 315. It took 97 LAFD Firefighters just 21 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish heavy fire in one upstairs unit to the rear of a two story cluster of center-hallway style residential fourplexes above parking. No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 29; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 10; BC1 BC11 BC18 BC5 CM22 E11 E13 E211 E220 E226 E227 E261 E27 E29 E52 E6 E61 EM1 EM11 EM9 HR3 RA11 RA29 RA52 RA6 RA827 SQ21 T11 T20 T26 T27 T61 UR27 UR88; CH9; 13 15; Brian Humphrey

title.a: Update Greater Alarm Structure Fire #HarvardFire 02/23/2022 INC#1160

item.description: Update #HarvardFire Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#1160; 05:36PM; 271 S Harvard Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3t1TZqe; #Koreatown; Address Remains Tentative. 97 LAFD Firefighters actively assigned in Offensive Firefighting Operations at what is now described as one upstairs unit to the rear of a *TWO* story cluster of center-hallway style residential fourplexes. This working fire is officially known as the "Harvard Fire".; FS 29; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 10; BC1 BC11 BC18 BC5 CM22 E11 E13 E211 E220 E226 E227 E261 E27 E29 E52 E6 E61 EM1 EM11 EM9 HR3 RA11 RA29 RA52 RA6 RA827 SQ21 T11 T20 T26 T27 T61 UR27 UR88; CH9; 13 15; Brian Humphrey

title.a: Update Major Emergency Structure Fire Correction - #ParkViewFire 02/22/2022 INC#1637

item.description: Update Correction - #ParkViewFire Major Emergency Structure Fire; INC#1637; 11:59PM; 930 S Park View St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3BWRh9D; #Westlake; CORRECTION: The severely threatened and occupied two story apartment building which sustained superficial damage was to the *NORTH*, and the other two story building, described as a possible daycare center, was to the *SOUTH* of the vacant 2 story Craftsman-style home that was well involved on LAFD arrival and destroyed in the blaze. Firefighters will continue to overhaul the fire, assuring complete extinguishment of smoldering debris, through the early morning hours. There remain no Injuries, and the fire cause is still the focus of an active investigation; FS 11; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 1; AR1 AR33 BC11 BC14 BC18 BC2 BC5 CM21 CM22 CM42 E13 E17 E20 E201 E202 E212 E215 E220 E226 E229 E235 E275 E285 E289 E35 E37 E48 E6 E89 E94 E95 EM1 HE1 HR3 PI4 RA11 RA20 RA811 RA813 RA89 T1 T12 T15 T2 T20 T26 T29 T35 T75 T85 T89 UR88 UR89; CH7; 14 15 16; Brian Humphrey

title.a: Knockdown - #ParkViewFire Major Emergency Structure Fire 02/22/2022 INC#1637

item.description: Knockdown - #ParkViewFire Major Emergency Structure Fire; INC#1637; 10:47PM; 930 S Park View St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3BWRh9D; #Westlake; 140 LAFD Firefighters took 46 minutes in largely defensive operations to hold fire to a vacant two story Craftsman-style home that was well involved on their arrival, limit fire damage to the exterior of a severely threatened and occupied two story apartment building to the south, and prevent damage to another two story building, described as a possible daycare center to the north. No Injury. Fire cause under active investigation.; FS 11; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC11 BC14 BC18 BC2 BC5 CM21 CM22 CM42 E13 E17 E20 E201 E202 E212 E215 E220 E226 E229 E235 E275 E285 E289 E35 E37 E48 E6 E89 E94 E95 EM1 HR3 PI4 RA11 RA20 RA811 RA813 RA89 T1 T12 T15 T2 T20 T26 T29 T35 T75 T85 T89 UR88 UR89; CH9; 14 15 16; Brian Humphrey

title.a: Knockdown - #MainStreetFire Major Emergency Structure Fire 02/22/2022 INC#1526

item.description: Knockdown - #MainStreetFire Major Emergency Structure Fire; INC#1526; 09:50PM; 1120 S Main St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3BLaY3L; #Downtown; 172 LAFD Firefighters took 70 minutes in transitional operations to access, confine and fully extinguish heavy fire in a 50' x 100' combination one- and two-story commercial building. The bulk of the fire was confined to the rearmost (one story) section. No Injury. Fire cause under active investigation.; FS 10; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; AR1 BC1 BC11 BC13 BC18 BC5 CE59 CM21 CM22 E1 E10 E11 E13 E14 E15 E17 E202 E203 E209 E210 E211 E215 E220 E221 E226 E227 E233 E26 E27 E29 E3 E35 E4 E9 EA1 EM11 HR3 RA10 RA11 RA29 RA810 RA9 SQ21 T10 T11 T15 T2 T20 T21 T26 T27 T3 T33 T9 UR27 UR88; CH7; 13 14; Brian Humphrey

title.a: Update Major Emergency Structure Fire #ParkViewFire 02/22/2022 INC#1637

item.description: Update #ParkViewFire Major Emergency Structure Fire; INC#1637; 10:20PM; 930 S Park View St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3BWRh9D; #Westlake; With 140 LAFD Firefighters assigned in Defensive Operations, this fire involving a vacant two story Craftsman-style home, and threatening a two story apartment building to the south, and another building (daycare center?) to the north, has escalated to Major Emergency status and is formally known as the Park View Fire.; FS 11; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC11 BC14 BC18 BC5 CM22 CM42 E20 E212 E220 E229 E235 E275 E285 E289 E35 E37 E48 E89 E94 E95 EM1 HR3 RA11 RA20 RA811 RA813 T12 T20 T29 T35 T75 T85 T89 UR88 UR89; CH9; 14 15 16; Brian Humphrey
